resources.string: Please feel free to scroll down to the questions and test your knowledge on Afrolatino history facts that were not taught in school!
What cartoon character did Esther Jones inspire?
Mexican folk dance is a blend of European, African, and Indigenous heritage.
Who came up with the phrase "Girl, bye"?
Bessie Coleman was the first African American woman who was licensed as a pilot?
The trial called Loving v. Virginia was based on what civil rights issue?
Mexico introduced chocolate, corn and chilies to the world.
In what year was Sissieretta Jones nicke named "the Black Patti" after Adelina Patti who was a prima donna from Italy?
